description:
"Heat Waves" by Glass Animals has been the #1 song on the Spotify Global Charts since January 23, 2022. "Envolver" by Anitta, however, recently rocketed up the charts to the #2 position.

This market asks whether the song "Envolver" by Anitta reaches the #1 spot on the Spotify Global "Top 200" Chart by April 14, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET.

If the song "Envolver" by Anitta is in the #1 spot on the Spotify Global "Top 200" Chart for any day between March 24, 2022 and April 14, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET (inclusive), this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market will be the "Top 200" charts on https://spotifycharts.com/regional/. The chart must be filtered by "Global", "Daily", and the date must be set between March 24, 2022, and April 14, 2022 (inclusive).

This source will be checked daily at 12:00 PM ET; if Envolver is #1 on any of the checks, the market will immediately resolve "Yes." If data for the relevant days is not available on the resolution date, April 15, 2022, 12:00 PM ET, this market will be checked daily at 12:00 PM ET for the next 5 days until it is available. If the data for the relevant days is still not available by the final check, April 20, 2022, 12:00 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

Note: the stream count you see in charts might look different from the app and Spotify for Artists.

Spotify generates chart stream numbers using a special formula that protects the integrity of charts, and makes sure all voices of the users are reflected. It means not every stream on Spotify is eligible for Charts. Some songs may have fewer chart-eligible streams than others, depending on streaming behavior.

markets.question: Will 'Envolver' by Anitta be the #1 song on the Spotify Global Charts by April 14, 2022?

title: Will 'Envolver' by Anitta be the #1 song on the Spotify Global Charts by April 14, 2022?
